data.title: Don't Touch the White Woman!
data.text:
CAST:

Marcello Mastroianni,

Catherine Deneuve,

Ugo Tognazzi

SCRIPT:

Rafael Azcona

Synopsis:

A modern Western with radical political commentaries. The famous battle of the Little Big Horn is transferred to Paris of the 1970s. Some of the actors in this eclectical movie wear costumes; some wear ordinary T-shirts… The film also recalls the Watergate affair, while its brutal ending evokes The Blue Soldier with Candice Bergen.
